body.p:
DITA XML is famous for its reuse capabilities. So how can I use the AI to identify content which can be replaced with a reference to a reusable component or with a product named defined as a key in the DITA Map? We worked on two specific AI actions to help you with identifying reusable content and product names:
Reuse->Product Names An action which uses the AI to identify possible product names in the selected content. For each product name, if there is a key defined for it in the DITA Map a key reference is used as its replacement. Example.
